text:
Just had siblings reunion here and the atmosphere was good. Large crowds maybe it was on Saturday.

Food was tasty only it was not served together as in it was served 1 by 1 so we never get to eat it with the rice altogether.

I came on a mid week evening. There was a sparse crowd. The place has seen better days, there's a section with the retractable  awning has lost its shade completely. It's a little dilapidated.  We went to house of white bee hoon for dinner. The restaurant is still good with good food. There was a pub next door blasting live music of dubious quality. But hey it's a vibe I guess. So this place is a mixed bag

Overall dining atmosphere is good as it just beside the Punggol coastal fronting Pasir Gudang (Malaysia).

For the atmosphere.

The see-saw is, however pretty irritating to the diners due to the swinging mechanism screeching while in use.

Ordering food is a challenge on a Saturday 7pm evening as the restaurant seems to be shortage of staff to take order ; one group of aunties to take main course order, one group of aunties + an uncle to take order for satay and another group of aunties to take order for drinks and desserts.

The food served is usual Restaurant standard ; nothing to call out but they have ‘Fire Show’ for some dishes whereby huge open flames are seen created by the waiter ; find it unnecessary as the diners will be stepping aside or away as the open flame is really HUGE !!

Plus the aunty waitress will perform dances for some dishes too ….

We were placed outside the AC premise which is fine as we prefer proximity to the coastal and the weather is pretty cooling. The only issue is this is a common walkway and baby stroller and wheelchair will often hit diners’ plastic chairs as they commute.

The restaurant is Pets Friendly. Saw a few dogs.

The SouthWest Pub Pork Belly Satay was excellent !!!
The White Bee Hoon Hor Fun was perfect !!!

Will go there every weekend if possible as the price is reasonable and good food available.
Super chill for drinking beer and having a good time with friends. 10mins walk from the new punggol coast mrt station.
